ygData.subject: RE: Saving lots of moolah (was Verant vs Powergamers)
ygData.msgSnippet: You think that s good, I got into the Phase 1 beta back in early July of 98.  I used to buy 1 or 2 games a month, but since then I think I ve bought a total
ygData.messageBody:
You think that's good, I got into the Phase 1 beta back in early July of
'98. I used to buy 1 or 2 games a month, but since then I think I've
bought a total of maybe 3 other games, none of which I have played (with
the exception of Grim Fandango, one of the best adventure games I've ever
played). So that's more than a year of game money saved by EQ. :)

And I'm STILL only a level 26 bard. :)

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci

At 05:01 PM 9/16/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
><LOL> I absolutely agree as well. Have not spent one iota of coin, err,
>money on video games since April - and not so much as a peek at new reviews,
>except maybe to snoop around for info on the new add-on.
>
>- Faras "I want my EQ" Tar'Linedhel
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
>> Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 4:33 PM
>> To: eqbards@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Verant vs Powergamers OT (was Plane of losses)
>>
>>
>> From: Moss <Olmoss@...>
>>
>>
>> > One last thing, before EQ came out, I averaged buying
>> about 10 computer
>> > games a year. A lot of them I would not even finish
>> because I got bored
>> > with them. I've been playing EQ since April and I am still
>> having lots of
>> > fun playing. As a 22d level bard, I still have alot of
>> things I can look
>> > forward to doing in the game. I haven't even considered
>> buying a new game
>> > since April.
>>
>> Well put !!!! I was just telling my wife how much money she save
>> because I have not brought the 3 or 4 games a month that I used to !
>> Now I may but Diablo 2 but EQ I play every day and the one game I
>> brought since EQ (TA Kingdoms) I haven't bothered to finish.
>> But I will
>> collect pop bottles on the side of the road to get the EQ
>> Expansion pack
>> :) You can't beat playing with real folk :)
>>
>> Bill, AKA Moonflower CZ-Thule
>>
